default.description: List of exporters to use by default

annotations.description: List of automatic annotations to include in export

source_annotations.description: List of annotations and attributes from the source to include

word.description: Annotation to use as token text in export

remove_module_namespaces.description: Remove module name prefixes from annotation names in export

sparv_namespace.description: Prefix to add to the names of all automatically created annotations

source_namespace.description: Prefix to add to the names of all annotations from source

scramble_on.description: What annotation to use as the smallest unit when scrambling

keep_control_chars.description: Set to True to keep control characters

normalize.description: Normalize input using any of the following forms: 'NFC', 'NFKC', 'NFD', and 'NFKD'

variety.description: Language variety of source files (if applicable)

sparv.description: Settings related to core Sparv functionality.

compression.description: Compression to use for files in work-dir ('none', 'gzip', 'bzip2' or 'lzma'. Default: 'gzip')

source_annotations.description: List of annotations and attributes from the source data to include. Everything will be included by default.

cwb.description: Exports, encodes and aligns corpora for Corpus Workbench.

remote_host.description: Remote host to install CWB files to

remote_registry_dir.description: CWB registry path on remote host

remote_data_dir.description: CWB datadir path on remote host

source_annotations.description: List of annotations and attributes from the source data to include. Everything will be included by default.

bin_path.description: Path to directory containing the CWB executables

datetime_informat.description: Format of the source date/time values. Several formats can be specified separated by |. They will be tried in order.

splitter.description: One or more characters separating two dates in 'datetime_from', treating them as from-date and to-date.

pre_regex.description: Regular expression with a catching group whose content will be used in the parsing instead of the whole string. Applied before splitting.

regex.description: Regular expression with a catching group whose content will be used in the parsing instead of the whole string. Applied on each value after splitting.

date_outformat.description: Desired format of the formatted dates. Several formats can be specified separated by |. They will be tied to their respective in-format.

out_annotation.description: Annotation on which the resulting formatted date attributes will be written.

time_outformat.description: Desired format of the formatted times. Several formats can be specified separated by |. They will be tied to their respective in-format.

prefix.description: Optional prefix to add to annotation names.

keep_control_chars.description: Set to True if control characters should not be removed from the text.

normalize.description: Normalize input using any of the following forms: 'NFC', 'NFKC', 'NFD', and 'NFKD'.

hunpos.description: Part of Speech annotation using Hunpos.

morphtable.description: Path to optional Hunpos morphtable file

tag_mapping.description: Optional tag mapping for translating the output tags

morphtable_hist.description: Path to optional Hunpos morphtable file (older Swedish)

tag_mapping_hist.description: Optional tag mapping for translating the output tags (older Swedish)

keep_formatting_chars.description: Set to True if you don't want formatting characters (e.g. soft hyphens) to be removed from tokens in the output.

head_tail_max_length.description: If set to an int misc.head and misc.tail will be truncated to that many characters.

prefix.description: Optional prefix to add to annotation names.

keep_control_chars.description: Set to True if control characters should not be removed from the text.

normalize.description: Normalize input using any of the following forms: 'NFC', 'NFKC', 'NFD', and 'NFKD'.

prefix.description: Optional prefix to add to annotation names.

keep_control_chars.description: Set to True if control characters should not be removed from the text.

normalize.description: Normalize input using any of the following forms: 'NFC', 'NFKC', 'NFD', and 'NFKD'.

stanza.description: POS tagging, lemmatisation and dependency parsing with Stanza.

use_gpu.description: Use GPU instead of CPU if available

batch_size.description: Limit Stanza batch size. Sentences with a token count exceeding this value will be excluded from analysis.

max_sentence_length.description: Max length (in number of tokens) of sentences that will get dependence annotations (set to 0 for no limit)

cpu_fallback.description: Fall back to CPU for sentences exceeding the max_sentence_length, instead of excluding them from dependence parsing. Only usable with use_gpu enabled.

max_token_length.description: Max number of characters per token. Any sentence containing a token exceeding this limit will be excluded from analysis. Disabled by default.

sentence_chunk.description: Text chunk (annotation) to use as input when segmenting sentences (not used for Swedish)

sentence_annotation.description: Optional existing sentence segmentation annotation (not used for Swedish)

token_annotation.description: Optional existing token annotation (not used for Swedish)

swe_pretrain_pos_model.description: Stanza pretrain POS model for Swedish

swe_pretrain_dep_model.description: Stanza pretrain dependency model for Swedish

source_annotations.description: List of annotations and attributes from the source data to include. None will be included by default.

cutoff.description: The minimum frequency a word must have in order to be included in the result

remote_dir.description: Path on remote host to install to

text_import.description: Import of plain text source files.

prefix.description: Optional prefix to add to annotation names.

encoding.description: Encoding of source file. Defaults to UTF-8.

keep_control_chars.description: Set to True if control characters should not be removed from the text.

normalize.description: Normalize input using any of the following forms: 'NFC', 'NFKC', 'NFD', and 'NFKD'.

filename_formatted.description: Filename pattern for resulting XML files, with '{file}' representing the source name.

filename.description: Filename pattern for resulting XML files, with '{file}' representing the source name.

source_annotations.description: List of annotations and attributes from the source data to include. Everything will be included by default.

header_annotations.description: List of headers from the source data to include. All headers will be included by default.

include_empty_attributes.description: Whether to include attributes even when they are empty.

include_version_info.description: Whether to include annotation version info in the combined XML.

filename_compressed.description: Filename of resulting compressed combined XML.

export_host.description: Remote host to copy XML export to

export_path.description: Target path to copy XML export to

export_scrambled_host.description: Remote host to copy scrambled XML export to

export_scrambled_path.description: Target path to copy scrambled XML export to

elements.description: List of elements and attributes in source file. Only needed for renaming or when used as input to other annotations, as everything is parsed whether listed or not.

skip.description: Elements and attributes to skip. Use elementname:@contents to skip contents as well.

header_elements.description: Elements containing header metadata. Contents will not be included in corpus text.

header_data.description: List of header elements and attributes from which to extract metadata.

prefix.description: Optional prefix to add to annotation names.

encoding.description: Encoding of source file. Defaults to UTF-8.

keep_control_chars.description: Set to True if control characters should not be removed from the text.

normalize.description: Normalize input using any of the following forms: 'NFC', 'NFKC', 'NFD', and 'NFKD'.

sbx_freeling.description: Annotations from FreeLing for various languages.

sentence_chunk.description: Text chunk (annotation) to use as input when segmenting sentences

timeout.description: Timeout (in seconds) after which to kill FreeLing if it does not respond

source_annotations.description: List of annotations and attributes from the source data to include. Everything will be included by default.

id.description: Annotation in ID field of CoNLL-U output

lemma.description: Annotation in LEMMA field of CoNLL-U output

upos.description: Annotation in UPOS field of CoNLL-U output

xpos.description: Annotation in XPOS field of CoNLL-U output

feats.description: Annotation in FEATS field of CoNLL-U output

head.description: Annotation in HEAD field of CoNLL-U output

deprel.description: Annotation in DEPREL field of CoNLL-U output

deps.description: Annotation in DEPS field of CoNLL-U output

misc.description: Annotation in MISC field of CoNLL-U output

lexical_classes.description: Annotations lexical classes from Blingbring or SweFN.

jar.description: Path name of the executable .jar file

comp_nst_model.description: Path to NST part of speech compound model

comp_use_source.description: Also use source text as lexicon for compound analysis

delimiter.description: Character to put between ambiguous results

affix.description: Character to put before and after sets of results

precision.description: Format string for appending precision to each value (e.g. ':%.3f')

precision_filter.description: Precision filter with possible values 'max' (only use the most probable annotations), 'first' (only use the single most probable annotation), 'none' (use all annotations)

min_precision.description: Only use annotations with a probability score greater than or equal to this. 0.25: part-of-speech does not match, 0.5: part-of-speech is missing, 0.66: part-of-speech matches, 0.75: morphosyntactic descriptor matches

skip_multiword.description: Whether to disable annotation of multiword expressions

max_mwe_gaps.description: Max amount of gaps allowed within a multiword expression

allow_multiword_overlap.description: Whether all multiword expressions may overlap with each other. If set to False, some cleanup is done.

word_separator.description: Character used to split the values of 'word' into several word variations

wsd.description: Word sense disambiguation based on SALDO annotation.

jar.description: Path name of the executable .jar file

prob_format.description: Format string for how to print the sense probability

fsv_model.description: Path to model for fornsvenska morphology

fsv_spelling.description: Path to model for fornsvenska spelling variants

max_mwe_gaps.description: Max amount of gaps allowed within a multiword expression

delimiter.description: Character to put between ambiguous results

affix.description: Character to put before and after sets of results

fsv_spelling.description: Path to model for fornsvenska spelling variants

affix.description: Character to put before and after sets of results

fsv_min_precision.description: Only use annotations with a probability score higher than this

affix.description: Character to put before and after sets of results

lemgram_key.description: Key to lookup in the lexicon

baseform_key.description: Key to lookup in the lexicon

fsv_spelling.description: Path to model for fornsvenska spelling variants

max_mwe_gaps.description: Max amount of gaps allowed within a multiword expression

delimiter.description: Character to put between ambiguous results

affix.description: Character to put before and after sets of results

fsv_min_precision.description: Only use annotations with a probability score higher than this

remote_host.description: Remote host to install to. Leave blank to install locally.

mysql_dbname.description: Name of database where Korp data will be stored

modes.description: The Korp modes in which the corpus will be published

protected.description: Whether this corpus should have limited access or not

config_dir.description: Path on remote host where Korp corpus configuration files are stored

wordpicture_table.description: Prefix used for Word Picture database table names

annotations.description: Sparv annotations to include. Leave blank to use cwb.annotations.

source_annotations.description: List of annotations and attributes from the source data to include. Leave blank to use cwb.source_annotations.

annotation_definitions.description: Frontend definitions of annotations in 'annotations' and 'source_annotations'. Classes and config keys are currently not supported.

context.description: Contexts to use in Korp, from smaller to bigger. Leave blank to detect automatically.

within.description: Search boundaries to use in Korp, from smaller to bigger. Leave blank to detect automatically.

filters.description: List of annotations to use for filtering in Korp

hidden_annotations.description: List of annotations not to include in corpus config

keep_undefined_annotations.description: Include all annotations in config, even those without an annotation definition/preset.

segment.description: Segmentation of text into smaller units.

token_chunk.description: Text chunk (annotation) to use as input when tokenizing

token_list.description: Path to optional token list file

sentence_chunk.description: Text chunk (annotation) to use as input when segmenting

paragraph_chunk.description: Text chunk (annotation) to use as input when segmenting

hidden_annotations.description: List of annotations not to include in corpus config

token_wordlist_segmenter.description: Segmenter to use when building wordlist

stanford.description: Annotations from Stanford Parser for English texts.

treetagger.description: Annotations from TreeTagger for various languages.
